name: Soul Searching
description: Soul Searching is a narrative survival game about sailing away from your homeland.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
